description.value:
Counts as Auspex with 5km range, penetrating walls one metre thick. Good Craftsmanship has 10km range, Best Craftsmanship gives +30 to Awareness Tests instead of +20.

Requirements

Can detect movement, vox signals, seismic disturbances, and other programmed things. Mounted on transportable chassis.

Effect: Very Rare

Notes: -
